column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////We had an appetizer sampler
column3: and another large deep dish with spinach
column5: and tomatoes. I'm not a pepperoni person (or a mushroom person) but I loved these pies. The cheese is thick and gooey
column7: and the crust is flaky. I preferred the simple pepperoni over the specialty pizza
column8: but both were quite good. Appetizers were just okay.
